function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation in the restaurant led to the spread of COVID-19 through aerosol transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of the virus and higher infection rates among diners in the restaurant.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing air changes per hour, and implementing effective filtration measures to reduce the spread of aerosols.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with advanced filtration, air purifiers, and increased air exchange rates.","People":"Diners at the restaurant, restaurant staff, other individuals in the vicinity of the infected area.","Owner":"Restaurant management, ventilation system engineers, HVAC professionals."},{"Description":"High infection rates in a call center in Seoul, South Korea, due to close proximity and potential aerosol transmission.","Impact":"High number of positive cases among employees on the call center floor, leading to potential spread to other areas and communities.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation, and promoting mask-wearing in the call center.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation system upgrades, and the use of partitions to reduce direct contact.","People":"Employees in the call center, visitors to the call center, other individuals in the vicinity of the infected area.","Owner":"Call center management, ventilation system engineers, health and safety authorities."}]}
